fablelite 0.0.0.9100
  • Reference

Reference

Models

Models which make use of models from other packages, or are useful for programming.

decomposition_model()

Decomposition modelling

combination_model()

Combination modelling

null_model() is_null_model()

NULL model

Forecast reconciliation

Use reconciliation techniques to ensure that forecasts are coherent with the hierarchical structure of data.

reconcile()

Forecast reconciliation

Accuracy measures

Functionality for evaluating model performance

accuracy()

Evaluate accuracy of a forecast or model

ME() MSE() RMSE() MAE() MPE() MAPE() MASE() ACF1() point_measures

Point estimate accuracy measures

winkler_score() interval_measures distribution_measures

Interval estimate accuracy measures

percentile_score()

Distribution accuracy measures

Methods

The fablelite package facilitates the handling of key structures for the following functions

forecast()

Produce forecasts

model()

Estimate models

report()

Report information about an object

generate(<mdl_df>)

Generate responses from a mable

interpolate(<mdl_df>) interpolate(<mdl_ts>)

Interpolate missing values

refit(<mdl_df>) refit(<mdl_ts>)

Refit a mable to a new dataset

stream()

Extend a fitted model with new data

augment(<mdl_df>) augment(<mdl_ts>)

Augment a mable

glance(<mdl_df>) glance(<mdl_ts>)

Glance a mable

tidy(<mdl_df>) tidy(<mdl_ts>)

Extract model coefficients from a mable

components(<mdl_df>) components(<mdl_ts>)

Extract components from a fitted model

Graphics

Some autoplot() and autolayer() methods are defined for classes commonly used within fablelite.

accuracy()

Evaluate accuracy of a forecast or model

aggregate_key()

Expand a dataset to include other levels of aggregation

as_dable()

Coerce to a dable object

as_fable()

Coerce to a fable object

as_mable()

Coerce a dataset to a mable

augment(<mdl_df>) augment(<mdl_ts>)

Augment a mable

bias_adjust()

Bias adjust back-transformation functions

box_cox() inv_box_cox()

Box Cox Transformation

cmbn_ensemble()

Ensemble combination

combination_model()

Combination modelling

components(<mdl_df>) components(<mdl_ts>)

Extract components from a fitted model

construct_fc()

Construct a new set of forecasts

dable()

Create a dable object

decomposition_model()

Decomposition modelling

model_definition decomposition_definition

R6 Objects

percentile_score()

Distribution accuracy measures

dist_normal() dist_mv_normal() dist_sim() dist_unknown()

estimate()

Estimate a model

fable()

Create a fable object

fablelite-package

fablelite: Core tools for fable extensions

new_fcdist() new_fcdist_env()

Is the object a hilo

Estimate models

Extract the left hand side of a model

model_rhs()

Extract the right hand side of a model

Provide a succinct summary of a model

Create a new class of decomposition

Create a new class of models

Helper to create a new decomposition function

new_specials()

Create evaluation environment for specials

Create a new modelling transformation

parse_model()

Parse the model specification for specials

Parse the RHS of the model formula for transformations

Parse the RHS of the model formula for specials

scale_level_gradient() scale_level_continuous()

Level colour scales

scale_x_yearquarter() scale_x_yearmonth() scale_x_yearweek()

tsibble datetime scales This set of scales defines new scales for aggregate time structures defined in tsibble.
